LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Xeno_NightHunter_Hediff.label: Night Hunt
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Xeno_NightHunter_Hediff.descri: The shadows awaken primal instincts, heightening speed and combat focus under cover of night.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Xeno_BattleFury_BuffHediff.de: A surge of primal rage fuels each strike, turning battle into a frenzy of motion and steel.\n\nEffect: Increases Move Speed and Melee Damage after scoring a kill with Tyrant’s Edge.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Xeno_GunneryConcentration_Buf: Focused firepower sharpens reflexes, driving the wielder into a rhythm of relentless shots.\n\nEffect: Increases Move Speed and reduces Aiming Time after scoring a kill with Obsidian Orator.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Xeno_RandomBuff_Hediff.label: echo of chaos
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Xeno_RandomBuff_Hediff.descrip: A lingering fragment of Rimuru Tempest’s unpredictable craft, pulsing with unstable energy. Once per day, the wielder receives a random positive effect.
LanguageData.OE_Tailborne_NeuralMesh_BuffHediff.label: neural mesh
LanguageData.OE_Tailborne_NeuralMesh_BuffHediff.descr: The blade weaves its wielder into a volatile combat network, feeding strength from shared presence. Each additional ally wielding the same blade increases melee damage for all.
